title: Inflammation links heart disease and depression

title_detail.value: Inflammation links heart disease and depression

summary: People with heart disease are more likely to suffer from depression, and the opposite is also true. Now, scientists believe they have identified a link between these two conditions: inflammation -- the body's response to negative environmental factors, such as stress.
